channel.title: Night Light InfoSec
channel.description: Recent content on Night Light InfoSec

item.title: But I Do the Very Thing I Hate
item.description: But I Do The Very Thing I Hate For I do not understand my own actions. For I do not do what I want, but I do the very thing I hate. � Romans 7:15 (ESV) At the end of each year, like I�m sure most do, I reflect on the things that I have accomplished. It�s great to remember all of the good things, but more often than not I find myself thinking about all of the things I didn�t do.

item.title: Now What
item.description: I Just Bought A Domain: Now What A Cautionary Tale Writing a blog post is such a great way to solidify your thoughts. When you write, you really have to think about what you are saying. When you buy a domain name though, sometimes you are living in the moment and forget about being logical. Planning After I bought my domain name, I wanted to jump right in and start learning the ins and outs of creating a website.

item.title: First Post
item.description: WELCOME Hello and welcome! I’m glad you’re here and hope that you find value in what I write and post here. If you want more information about me, please check out my About page. I’m going to leave this short since I’m still developing all of this! Thanks for visiting!

ABOUT ME I'm a SOC analyst trying to learn new things. I had been thinking about creating a website for myself, but could never seem to come up with a good name. Then one night after putting my kids to bed, I looked over at their nightlight and thought about all the times I have stayed up studying after putting them to bed. I immediately checked to see if the name was registered, and that's how NightlightInfoSec.
